EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.New Confirm - Manila
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Big Data Roadshow Manila
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 14, 2015 Venue coming soon {{my.Save the Date - Manila:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila> in Manila.
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>. AGENDA
8:15 AM - 8:30 AM Check-In & Breakfast
8:30 AM - 9:30 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
9:30 AM - 9:45 AM Coffee Break
9:45 AM - 11:15 AM Internet of Things Demo and Architecture Overview
11:15 AM - 12:30 PM Hands-On Technical Workshop
12:30 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/manila>
